    app: nginx-deployment
    fruta: banana
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: giropops
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19.1
        name: giropops
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.3"
            memory: 64Mi

##### FILE: nginx-deployment_cm.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to prod/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: prod
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: date
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: date
              name: myconfig1
        - name: hostname1
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: hostname
              name: myconfig1
        - name: vegdish
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dish
              name: myconfig1
        image: nginx:1.12
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment10.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-tl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-tl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-tl
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-tl
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: thijslintermans/nginx-tl-milestone2:1.0
        name: nginx-tl
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

---

1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

    app: nginx

  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: nginx

      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2

        ports:

##### FILE: nginx-deployment11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx-container
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: nginx-config-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: nginx.conf
            path: default.conf
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config-volume

---

kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: nginx
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/nginx:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: nginx
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/nginx:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: nginx
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: nginx

  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

kind: Deployment

    app: nginx
  name: deployment-nginx
  namespace: default

  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: contendor-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http

##### FILE: nginx-deployment122.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config-volume
          subPath: nginx.conf
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/secret
          name: nginx-secret-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config-volume
      - name: nginx-secret-volume
        secret:
          secretName: nginx-secret

---

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/nginx:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: nginx
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/nginx:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: nginx
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/nginx:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: nginx
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/nginx:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: nginx
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nginx/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
    dataprotection: k10-goldpolicy
    immutable: enabled
    purpose: production
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: nginx
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/nginx:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: nginx
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

##### FILE: nginx-deployment131.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.23.3-alpine
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: usr/share/nginx/html
          name: cs548-site-volume
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - until [ -f /cs548-site/index.html ]; do sleep 2; done
        image: alpine:latest
        name: init-container
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /cs548-site
          name: cs548-site-volume
      volumes:
      - name: cs548-site-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: cs548-site-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.8
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: nginx-vol
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: nginx-vol

kind: Deployment

    app: nginx

  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:

      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

        - mountPath: /app/kpf/enable-config
          name: app-config-volume
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: app-config
        name: app-config-volume

##### FILE: nginx-deployment146.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/deployment-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: deployment-nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: contendor-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:

        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: html-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: html-files
        name: html-volume

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.24.0
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: nginx-volume
      volumes:
      - name: nginx-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: nginx-pvc

##### FILE: nginx-deployment163.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: html-volume
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/caio.novelletto/Downloads/study_kio/kubernetes/nginx-volume/html
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: html-volume

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment179.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: nginx-html
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: nginx-logs
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      - image: php:7.4-fpm
        name: php-fpm
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: nginx-html
        - mountPath: /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
          name: php-fpm-config
          subPath: www.conf
      volumes:
      - name: nginx-html
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: nginx-pvc
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: nginx-logs
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config
      - configMap:
          name: php-fpm-config
        name: php-fpm-config

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment185.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to <ns>/Deployment/rengine-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: rengine-nginx
    rengine: nginx
  name: rengine-nginx
  namespace: <ns>
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: rengine-nginx
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: rengine-nginx
        rengine: nginx
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: false
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.25.4
        imagePullPolicy: ""
        name: rengine-nginx
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/
          name: rengine-nginx-conf
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/staticfiles
          name: rengine-web-pv
      restartPolicy: Always
      serviceAccountName: ""
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: rengine-nginx-conf
        name: rengine-nginx-conf
      - name: rengine-web-pv
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: rengine-web-pv
status: {}

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default

  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:

      - image: nginx:1.16
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

##### FILE: nginx-deployment187.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7800
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-conf
          subPath: nginx.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: nginx.conf
            path: nginx.conf
          name: nginx-conf
        name: nginx-conf

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment189.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nginx/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: nginx
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:###JACKAL_CONST_NGINX_VERSION###
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/01_http.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: 01_http.conf
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: index.html
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-configmap
        name: nginx-config

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment194.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9113"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      - args:
        - -nginx.scrape-uri=http://localhost/metrics
        image: nginx/nginx-prometheus-exporter:0.11.0
        name: nginx-exporte
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.3

##### FILE: nginx-deployment200.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9113"
        prometheus.io/scrap: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.3"
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      - args:
        - -nginx.scrape-uri=http://localhost/metrics
        image: nginx/nginx-prometheus-exporter:0.11.0
        name: nginx-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.3"
            memory: 128Mi
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: nginx-deployment210.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: my-nginx:1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: my-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

##### FILE: nginx-deployment219.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19.0
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: nginx
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - curl
            - -f
            - http://localhost:80/
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.25
            memory: 128Mi
        startupProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
          timeoutSeconds: 5

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-deployment

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: nginx-deployment224.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html
          name: php-app-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-config-volume
          subPath: default.conf
      volumes:
      - name: php-app-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: php-app-pvc
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: default.conf
            path: default.conf
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config-volume

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment229.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9113"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.3"
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      - args:
        - -nginx.scrape-uri=http://localhost/metrics
        image: nginx/nginx-prometheus-exporter:0.11.0
        name: nginx-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.3"
            memory: 128Mi
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-server

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-server
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-server failed:

kind: Deployment

  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

      - image: nginx:1.19.0
        name: nginx
        ports:

          name: config-volume
          subPath: nginx.conf

          name: nginx-config
        name: config-volume

##### FILE: nginx-deployment231.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-server
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: node-role
                operator: In
                values:
                - server
      containers:
      - image: nginx:stable-alpine
        name: nginx-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment234_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-conf:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: "events {\n    worker_connections 1024;\n}\n\nhttp {\n  server {\n    listen
    80;\n    server_name _;\n\n    location / {\n        add_header 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin'
    '*' always;\n        add_header 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods' 'GET, POST, OPTIONS'
    always;\n        add_header 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers' 'DNT,User-Agent,X-Requested-With,If-Modified-Since,Cache-Control,Content-Type,Range'
    always;\n        \n        if ($request_method = 'OPTIONS') {\n            add_header
    'Access-Control-Max-Age' 1728000;\n            add_header 'Content-Type' 'text/plain
    charset=UTF-8';\n            add_header 'Content-Length' 0;\n            return
    204;\n        }\n\n        proxy_pass http://api-gw:8003;\n        proxy_set_header
    Host $host;\n        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;\n        proxy_set_header
    X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;\n        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto
    $scheme;\n    }\n  }\n}"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-conf
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-ingress-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: nginx-ingress
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: nginx-ingress
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/nginx-configuration
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/kubernetes-ingress-controller/nginx-ingress-controller:0.31.1
        name: nginx-ingress-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https

---

        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html

##### FILE: nginx-deployment245.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: mypvcnginx
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo "<h1>Hello from Kubernetes</h1>" > /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html
        image: busybox
        name: init-nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: mypvcnginx
      volumes:
      - name: mypvcnginx
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: nginx-pvc

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-deployment

##### FILE: nginx-deployment25_14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.3.0
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-controller-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-nginx
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/controller:v1.3.0@sha256:d1707ca76d3b044ab8a28277a2466a02100ee9f58a86af1535a3edf9323ea1b5
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: nginx-deployment25_15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-create:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.3.0
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.3.0
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - create
        - --host=ingress-nginx-controller-admission,ingress-nginx-controller-admission.$(POD_NAMESPACE).svc
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.1.1@sha256:64d8c73dca984af206adf9d6d7e46aa550362b1d7a01f3a0a91b20cc67868660
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: create
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment25_16.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-patch:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.3.0
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.3.0
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - patch
        - --webhook-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --patch-mutating=false
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --patch-failure-policy=Fail
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.1.1@sha256:64d8c73dca984af206adf9d6d7e46aa550362b1d7a01f3a0a91b20cc67868660
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: patch
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment25_18.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ValidatingWebhookConfiguration/ingress-nginx-admission:
apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1
kind: ValidatingWebhookConfiguration
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.3.0
  name: ingress-nginx-admission
  namespace: default
webhooks:
- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1
  clientConfig:
    service:
      name: ingress-nginx-controller-admission
      namespace: ingress-nginx
      path: /networking/v1/ingresses
  failurePolicy: Fail
  matchPolicy: Equivalent
  name: validate.nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io
  rules:
  - apiGroups:
    - networking.k8s.io
    apiVersions:
    - v1
    operations:
    - CREATE
    - UPDATE
    resources:
    - ingresses
  sideEffects: None

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment250.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f ../docker-compose.yaml
    kompose.version: 1.33.0 (HEAD)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: nginx
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f ../docker-compose.yaml
        kompose.version: 1.33.0 (HEAD)
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/poc-kubernetes-with-minikube-and-kompose-nginx-net: "true"
        io.kompose.service: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9999
          hostPort: 9999
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-cm0
          readOnly: true
          subPath: nginx.conf
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: nginx.conf
            path: nginx.conf
          name: nginx-cm0
        name: nginx-cm0

---

      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mcr.microsoft.com/oss/nginx/nginx:1.15.2-alpine
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

##### FILE: nginx-deployment264.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19.1
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.25"
            memory: 128Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment283.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9113"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      - args:
        - -nginx.scrape-uri=http://localhost/metrics
        image: nginx/nginx-prometheus-exporter:0.11.0
        name: prometheus-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: metrics
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 0.3
            memory: 128Mi
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: gitlab.cs.pub.ro:5050/scgc/cloud-courses/nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html
          name: nginx-html-vol
          subPath: index.html
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-conf-vol
          subPath: default.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: index.html
            path: index.html
          name: nginx-html
        name: nginx-html-vol
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: default.conf
            path: default.conf
          name: nginx-conf
        name: nginx-conf-vol

kind: Deployment
metadata:

  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:

      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:

      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx

        - containerPort: 80

          subPath: nginx.conf

      - configMap:

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/gachis:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: gachis
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/gachis:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: gachis
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: gachis
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.3.0
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-controller-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-nginx
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/controller:v1.3.0@sha256:d1707ca76d3b044ab8a28277a2466a02100ee9f58a86af1535a3edf9323ea1b5
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure

        runAsUser: 2000

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.3.0
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.3.0
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - patch
        - --webhook-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --patch-mutating=false
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --patch-failure-policy=Fail
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.1.1@sha256:64d8c73dca984af206adf9d6d7e46aa550362b1d7a01f3a0a91b20cc67868660
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: patch
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: web

    matchLabels:
      pod: nginx

##### FILE: nginx-deployment31_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nextcloud/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: nextcloud
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - preference:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/APP
                operator: In
                values:
                - APP
            weight: 1
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PHP_SOCKET
          value: nextcloud-service:9000
        - name: WEBROOT
          value: /var/www/html
        - name: INCLUDE
          value: include /etc/nginx/conf.d/nextcloud.include;
        image: nginx:alpine
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-confs
          readOnly: true
          subPath: nginx.conf
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/templates/default.conf.template
          name: nginx-confs
          readOnly: true
          subPath: default.conf.template
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/templates/nextcloud.include.template
          name: nginx-confs
          readOnly: true
          subPath: nextcloud.include.template
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: log
        - mountPath: /var/www/html
          name: nextcloud-config-pvc
          subPath: nextcloud/nc-config
      volumes:
      - name: nextcloud-config-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: nextcloud-config-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-confs
        name: nginx-confs
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: log

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource nextcloud/Deployment/nginx failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource nextcloud/Deployment/nginx failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to custom-namespace/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: custom-namespace
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: efs-document-root
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: efs-log-dir
      volumes:
      - name: efs-document-root
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: efs-pvc-doc
      - name: efs-log-dir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: efs-pvc-log

##### FILE: nginx-deployment314.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: nginx
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - curl
            - -f
            - http://localhost:80/
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.25
            memory: 128Mi
        startupProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
          timeoutSeconds: 5

---

      - command:

        - -c
        - until nc -zv mysql-service 3306; do echo "Waiting for MySQL to be ready...";
          sleep 5; done;
        image: alpine:latest
        name: init-mysql

kind: Deployment

  name: nginx-tl
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

      app: nginx-tl

    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-tl
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: thijslintermans/nginx-tl-milestone2:1.0
        name: nginx-tl
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

##### FILE: nginx-deployment33.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx-container
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: nginx-config-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: nginx.conf
            path: default.conf
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config-volume

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

##### FILE: nginx-deployment49.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9113"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      - args:
        - -nginx.scrape-uri=http://localhost/metrics
        image: nginx/nginx-prometheus-exporter:0.11.0
        name: nginx-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.3"
            memory: 128Mi
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-server

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-server

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-server failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-server failed:

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

##### FILE: nginx-deployment50.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.25"
            memory: 128Mi

---

        app: nginx-depl

##### FILE: nginx-deployment63.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to reverse-proxy/Deployment/reverse-proxy-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: reverse-proxy-nginx
  namespace: reverse-proxy
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: reverse-proxy-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: reverse-proxy-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 443
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/
          name: reverse-proxy-nginx-conf
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/ssl/
          name: reverse-proxy-certificate-conf
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: default.conf
            path: default.conf
          name: default.conf
        name: reverse-proxy-nginx-conf
      - name: reverse-proxy-certificate-conf
        secret:
          items:
          - key: root.crt
            path: root.crt
          - key: server.crt
            path: server.crt
          - key: server.key
            path: server.key
          - key: server.password
            path: server.password
          secretName: reverse-proxy-certificate

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment64.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: nginx
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-claim0
          readOnly: true
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/desktop/mnt/host/d/repositories/kubernetes/nginx_data/nginx.conf
        name: nginx-claim0
status: {}

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment67.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 0
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-config-volume
          subPath: default.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-configmap
        name: nginx-config-volume

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment72.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.22-alpine
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/
          name: nginx-config
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: static-html
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-conf
        name: nginx-config
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/dev/api-core-main/proj/65sa-web-chat
        name: static-html

---


Mutation:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - nodePort: 30004
    port: 80
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 80
  selector:
    app: nginx
  type: NodePort

##### FILE: nginx-deployment74.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f docker-compose.yml -o Kube_Manifests/
    kompose.version: 1.31.2 (a92241f79)
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: nginx
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f docker-compose.yml -o Kube_Manifests/
        kompose.version: 1.31.2 (a92241f79)
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/jenkins-devops-exams-test-default: "true"
        io.kompose.service: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          hostPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-claim0
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: nginx-claim0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: nginx-claim0
status: {}

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment79_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/nginx-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
  name: nginx-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: localhost
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: nginx-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: foo-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /foo(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: Prefix

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/nginx-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
  name: nginx-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: localhost
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: nginx-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: foo-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /foo(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: Prefix

##### FILE: nginx-deployment86.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9113"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      - args:
        - -nginx.scrape-uri=http://localhost/metrics
        image: nginx/nginx-prometheus-exporter:0.11.0
        name: nginx-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.3
            memory: 128Mi
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment9_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nextcloud/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: nextcloud
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - preference:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/APP
                operator: In
                values:
                - APP
            weight: 1
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PHP_SOCKET
          value: nextcloud-service:9000
        - name: WEBROOT
          value: /var/www/html
        - name: INCLUDE
          value: include /etc/nginx/conf.d/nextcloud.include;
        image: nginx:alpine
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-confs
          readOnly: true
          subPath: nginx.conf
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/templates/default.conf.template
          name: nginx-confs
          readOnly: true
          subPath: default.conf.template
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/templates/nextcloud.include.template
          name: nginx-confs
          readOnly: true
          subPath: nextcloud.include.template
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: log
        - mountPath: /var/www/html
          name: nextcloud-config-pvc
          subPath: nextcloud/nc-config
      volumes:
      - name: nextcloud-config-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: nextcloud-config-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-confs
        name: nginx-confs
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: log

---

##### FILE: nginx-deployment-addinity.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-gpu:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-gpu
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: region
                operator: In
                values:
                - us-east
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx-gpu
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi

---


Mutation:
